summary.value: AGA, crystal, energy, magnetization, anisotropy, exchange, Tc, domain wall width, exchange stiffness

production info.value: obtained by Adaptive Genetic Algorithm,  software USPEX+VASP

crystal info.value: software VASP, k-points mesh 16x16x11, Ecut-off=400 eV, PAW_PBE, Fe_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Ni_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000,Pressure=0.0 kbar,temperature=0K

energy info.value: software VASP(vasp.5.4.1), k-points mesh 16x16x11, Ecut-off=400 eV, PAW_PBE, Fe_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Ni_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Pressure=0.0 kbar,temperature=0K

magnetization info.value: software VASP, k-points mesh 16x16x11, Ecut-off=400 eV, PAW_PBE, Fe_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Ni_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Pressure=0.0 kbar

anisotropy info.value: software VASP, including spin-orbit coupling, 2816 k-points in IBZ, Ecut-off=400 eV, PAW_PBE, Fe_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Ni_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Pressure=0.0 kbar

exchange info.value: software Fleur (v26), spin spirals (Fourier transform), kmax=4.1 a.u., 1960 k-points and 463 q-points, PBE, Pressure=0.0 kbar

curie temperature info.value: Atomistic Spin Dynamics, system size 40x40x40 spins, periodic boundary conditions

domain wall info.value: Atomistic Spin Dynamics, system size 300x40x40 spins, temperature=5K

exchange stiffness info.value: Atomistic Spin Dynamics, system size 300x40x40 spins, temperature=5K

reference.value: P. Nieves, S. Arapan, T. Schrefl, and S. Cuesta-López, Atomistic spin dynamics simulations of the MnAl t-phase and its antiphase boundary, Phys. Rev. B 96, 224411 (2017)
